gamedata.controller

Interface IHighScoresController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HighScoresController

    public interface IHighScoresController
    The purpose of this interface is to serve as the public interface with which the ISplashScreen can interact to deal with high scores functionality if the high scores button is pressed.
    Author:
    cmt57

    • Method Detail

      • getAllGameScores

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> getAllGameScores()
        Enables Game Player to obtain non game-specific (every game's) high scores for displaying purposes on a score board
        Returns:
        Map> maps a game's identifier (name) to a map of that game's high scores information per player

      • getGameHighScores

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getGameHighScores()
        Enables Game Player to obtain game-specific high scores for displaying purposes on a score board
        Returns:
        Map that maps all of a game's players to their high scores
